parts.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>Subject: Referral of Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Dear [Department Head Name],

This memo formally refers the following unresolved customer grievances to your department for further investigation and resolution. We have exhausted our standard customer service protocols in attempting to address these issues, and believe that specialized attention is now required.

Please find attached to this memo the detailed case files for each customer, including all relevant communication logs, transaction histories, and initial complaint details. A brief summary of each case is provided below:

*   **Case ID [Case ID 1]:** [Customer Name] - Complaint regarding [Brief description of complaint]. Initial attempts to resolve the issue through [Methods attempted] were unsuccessful.

*   **Case ID [Case ID 2]:** [Customer Name] - Complaint regarding [Brief description of complaint]. The customer remains dissatisfied despite our efforts to [Methods attempted].

*   **Case ID [Case ID 3]:** [Customer Name] - Complaint regarding [Brief description of complaint]. We have been unable to reach a mutually agreeable solution after [Number] attempts.

We kindly request that your department review these cases thoroughly and contact the customers directly to understand their concerns fully. Please keep us informed of the progress and the proposed resolutions for each case. We are available to provide any additional information or assistance you may require.

We appreciate your prompt attention to these matters, as customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to our organization.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

Senior Customer Service Representative</OUTPUT_TEXT>
